channel.title: Music – Rory Block
channel.description: Recent content in Rory Block on Music

item.title: Rory Block - Gypsie Boy
item.description:
작곡: Rory Block / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 60010

The gypsie ran away
to an island
In the south
my love sweet love
With berries
in his mouth
Somewhere
in the wind
He smells a
sweet perfume
My love sweet love-
shistling a tune
Do- do- do- do-
hey- yeah-
The gypsie boy
said you own
My heart
you hold it in
In your loving hand
and you carry beside
You in your
sweet and lonesome
Way yeah-
and it is aoo
That I can do
do make it through
Do- do- yeah-
do- hey- do-
Notes upon
the strings
So lovely
while he sings
His song his song
if only I had wings-
I would fly away
to a highland
Gathering
my love sweet love
I love to hear
you play
Do- do- do- do-
hey- yeah-

Do- hey- um-
do- do- hey-
Do- hey- ah-
do- do- do-
